page.title: 17Visiting Doctor and Dentist
page.content:
I don't like doctors waiting rooms. We have to wait so long and everyone is quiet and sad looking. Last time I went to the doctor for a rash on my tummy I had to have two medicines. They were both lovely. I had to have them three times a day and my rash went away.
The dentist I go to has a lovely waiting room with green velvet seats and a T.V. to watch and magazines to read. There are toys in another room for children to play with. I go for a check up every six months. If one is bad I have to have a filling or have one out. I have gas to put me to sleep, some people have an injection of novacaine and I wouldn't like that.
